articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: More than 100 people simultaneously unveiled signs with the same message "I oppose genocide. I support Palestine Action" in Westminster's Parliament Square.
articles.title: Police make arrests at Palestine Action ban protests

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Historian Andrew Lownie has made some unflattering claims in a book about Prince Andrew.
articles.title: Prince Andrew book seals his fate for any return

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Under the proposals, those who are given fixed-term sentences could be deported straight away and would be barred from re-entering the UK.
articles.title: Foreign criminals to face deportation after sentencing under new plans

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: In a fresh extract from her memoir Sturgeon describes the breakdown of her relationship with her late mentor.
articles.title: Nicola Sturgeon denies 'conspiracy to destroy' Alex Salmond

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Sarah Yorke died on Friday while competing in Aston-le-Walls Horse Trials, British Eventing says.
articles.title: Horse rider dies after fall during Northamptonshire event

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Details of six sex charges facing the comedian emerged during a hearing at Glasgow Sheriff Court.
articles.title: Hardeep Singh Kohli accused of indecent assault in BBC studio

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Zelensky also said Ukraine will not give up land to Russia, as European security advisors meet in the UK.
articles.title: Ukraine must be part of peace solution, Zelensky says ahead of Trump-Putin meeting

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Some feel left out of a new government jobs scheme, but others are excited about the opportunity to get into the civil service.
articles.title: Working class students divided on civil service summer internship reform

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The BBC visits sites of protests to hear the voices of those opposed to the hotels and others in support of asylum seekers.
articles.title: 'People are angry': Behind the wave of asylum hotel protests

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: About 20 homes have been evacuated near Holt Heath as a precaution.
articles.title: Major incident declared as crews tackle two blazes in Dorset
